United Airlines Cancellation Policy

If you want to cancel a flight you booked on United Airlines then, you must have knowledge about every rule, term, and condition related to the United Airlines cancellation policy.

Compared to other airlines, United cancellation policy, and United Airlines refund policy are fairly straightforward and transparent. They have established guidelines to adhere to before making any change to a previously booked flight. Airlines has made a few improvements to their cancellation policy for both domestic and international flights in order to make them more user-friendly and convenient for United Airlines flyer. Additionally, nearly all types of airline tickets are subject to change costs on United Airlines.

Type of tickets

Economy

One of the most reasonably priced and comfortable airline seats is the United economy. Furthermore, you can easily cancel your United economy airline flight ticket, and the money will be refunded to your United account as travel credit, which later can be used to book your next trip. In accordance with the destination and fare class, there are certain cancellation fees associated if you cancel your United economy ticket.

Basic Economy

Basic Economy is the most economical ticket available by United Airlines, and they have all of the comforts of the other cabins with a few limitations and restrictions. If you cancel your United Basic Economy flight ticket within the 24-hour window, you will be eligible for a full refund; however, if you cancel your flight after this period, you will be charged a cancellation fee based on the kind of trip you purchased. In addition, according to the refund policy, the reimbursement will be in the form of travel credit.

Economy Plus

Everybody prefers greater legroom and a seat near the front of the plane for quick and simple exits. Moreover, the benefits of the United economy plus plans include premier flying points. You can cancel your economy plus ticket, but there is a cost attached to it, per United Airlines' cancellation policy. In addition, your United account will be reimbursed with the reimbursement in the form of a travel fund.

First Class

Everybody prefers extra legroom and a seat near the front of the plane for quick and simple exits. The benefits of the United economy plus flights also include premier flying points. Moreover as per United Airlines' cancellation policy you can cancel your economy plus ticket, but there is a cost attached to it. In addition, your United account will be reimbursed with the refund in the form of a travel fund.

Business Class

United offers a Business class cabin on flights between the United States and its transcontinental routes, as well as flights to Latin America and the Caribbean. United's business class tickets are refundable. According to United Airlines' cancellation policy for business class, you can modify your ticket for free, but you must pay if you want to cancel it. While United's business class refund policy indicates that the return will be in the form of points that can be used to book your next flight with the airline.

Premium Plus

The flyer considers United Premium Plus class tickets to be the finest because they offer space to recline, additional legroom, elbow room, and a power outlet and USB charger at each seat. According to United airline's cancellation policy, they have extended the policy for premium plus class. These tickets are non-refundable in nature and cost a cancellation fee. Furthermore, the refund for Premium Plus is provided in the form of mile points.

Polaris Class

The onboard comfort in United Airlines' Polaris class is preferable to that of other class fares. Features for United Airlines' Polaris class have been extended, and they are now offering further privileges, including mattress cushions, luxury bedding, complimentary drinks and food, and a user-friendly cancellation policy. The Polaris flight ticket from United Airlines is non-refundable by nature and costs a cancellation fee. While the refund is given in the form of travel funds.

Guidelines

If the vacation to a certain destination is decided by you but your plans get changed, United Airlines allows you to cancel your United flight within 24 hours before your itinerary begins. Learn about United airlines' cancellation terms and conditions before canceling your flight.

  • No cancellation fee will be waived for passengers who cancel their flight before 24 hours of booking.
  • If you did not complete your check-in on time then, United will cancel the flight refund and charge you a cancellation fee.
  • What if United cancels my flight? Relax you will be provided with the next flight ticket or the refund will be made by the airlines.
  • According to United Airlines flight delay policy if the flight delays are more than 5 hours then you can ask to cancel your flight and united will pay you a flight delay refund.
  • In case of a natural disaster or the demise of a family member or any other emergency you can cancel your fiht without paying any extra fee.
  • United airlines basic economy cancellation policy state that you can only cancel basic economy united before 24 hours of booking. Moreover,united airlines basic economy refund will be made on the original form of payment.
  • When it comes to non-refundable tickets, passengers have only 24 hours from the time of purchase to cancel. If they exceed that period, they must pay a cancellation fee.
  • If a passenger uses a United gift certificate to purchase a flight ticket, the refund is issued in an electronic travel voucher, future flight credits, and United travel bank credits as per United Airlines refund policy.
  • If you cancel your ticket then, your pet animal will be not allowed to travel alone in the cabin.

How To Cancel United Airlines Flight?

When we reserve a ticket for a trip, the first thing that comes to mind is, "What if the trip cancels?" Is it possible to cancel my flight reservation, and if so, how? United understands your concern and has created several alternatives for cancellations for your convenience. But, make sure to cancel your United flight at least one day before departure to receive a refund in the form of points for non-refundable tickets and in original form for refundable tickets. Also, the United airs line takes 7 business days to process credit card refunds after they are requested, while cash refunds can take up to 20 business days.

Online

As per United Airlines cancellation policy, Following are the Steps to Cancel your flight ticket online:

  • Visit the United Airlines website.
  • Go to my trips and you will be asked to fill following details:
    1. Confirmation number or MileagePlus number
    2. Last Name
  • Click on the search button.
  • After login into your United Airlines account, then select manage, and from all options choose cancel options to the extreme right.
  • Select the flight you want to cancel and click on the cancel tab.
  • Now you will receive a United Airlines cancellation e-credit after deducting the cancellation fee.

Airport

If the passenger is at the United airport and wants to cancel their ticket. they can do that by visiting the airport and requesting the airline to cancel the flight up to 3 hours prior to departure according to United Airlines cancellation policy.

Via Call

You can contact +1-888-526-4112 to the air counter executive to cancel the United flight but passengers must have a booking confirmation number with them. To cancel the flight they need to pay some cancellation charges over the phone.

Miles

  • If you book your ticket with United MileagePlus miles, you can cancel your flight online or by calling customer service.
  • To cancel an award ticket 30 days or less before departure and have the points redeposited, you’ll pay a fee but if you cancel at most 31 days prior to departure there will be no fees.
  • According to United Airlines cancellation policy for general members, the United miles redeposit fee is $125.
  • For elite members, fees can go as low as $50 for Premier Platinum and are free for Premier 1K members.

United 24 hours Cancellation Policy

With United you can cancel your flight with no cancellation fee. According to United Airlines' 24-hour cancellation policy, you can cancel any fare ticket, including non-refundable, trips, group, and other tickets, and one leg of a flight for free. United does charge a cancellation fee, although it is excluded if done within 24 hours. To find out more about this policy, read the following points.

  • If cancellation takes place during the same day of the reservation, cancel the United flight within 24 hours passengers don't need to pay any fees to United Airlines and get a full refund to the passenger's account within 7 days, as per United flight cancellation policy.
  • United Airlines cancellation policy 24 hours is also applicable on the Basic Economy if you cancel the ticket within the timeframe.
  • Any PNR greater than 9 passengers is not covered under the 24-hour cancellation. It would be subject to a group contract according to United Airlines group travel cancellation policy.
  • Except for the flight reservation made with a United Gift Certificate, which will be credited back in electronic travel certificates, refund requests will be done in the original payment method.

After 24 hours

United cancellation policy states that cancellation rules might be different depending on the ticket type you purchased in case of cancellation proceed more than 24 hours after booking.

Before 24 hours

United airlines Cancellation policy specifies that if a flight is canceled by the passenger within 24 hours of booking, regardless of price type, the cancellation will be processed free of charge, which means no further fee will be levied by the airline.

United Airlines Cancellation Policy 2022

Following are the fare types guidelines regarding cancellation which passengers have to know while purchasing these tickets under United airlines cancellation policy.

Refundable Tickets:

If you purchased a united refundable flights ticket then, you can cancel the flight and get a refund within 7 days to your credit card. Refundable tickets are a bit more expensive but have an edge over non-refundable tickets as the flyer can be more flexible with his/her travel and no additional charges will be asked to cancel or change the flight even at the last moment.

Non-Refundable Tickets:

According to the United Airlines cancellation policy for nonrefundable flight fares you are not going to get cashback in the original form of payment if you cancel your ticket. Also, you have to pay a certain amount for cancellation fees.

After you pay the cancellation fee, you can use the unused value of your ticket towards a future trip with United Airlines. The refund will be in the form of points and will be saved in your United account.

Award Tickets

If you have purchased a ticket using reward points, the ticket can be cancelled in accordance with the United cancellation policy. For more information about the United award ticket policy, read the following points.

  • If you redeemed MileagePlus miles for your flight and want to cancel your flight, you have the option to use the miles or redeposit the points for the next trip in the future.
  • If you choose to redeposit your miles for a flight departing in 30 days or less, redeposit fees will apply.
  • If you cancel your flight 31 or more days before departure, you don't need to pay any kind of fees as per United airlines cancellation policy and your miles will get redeposit.

Illness or Death:

The United Airlines ticket cancellation policy allows full refunds in case of death, due to death in the family, or certain kinds of illnesses. The policy covers all types of tickets whether purchased by cash, credit card, or check, as well as award tickets. Moreover, according to the United airlines refund policy for medical reasons or death you will get the full refund to the original form of payment after sharing the proper documentation for the reason.

Booked with Miles:

  • If you book your ticket with United MileagePlus miles, you can cancel your flight online or by calling customer service.
  • To cancel an award ticket 30 days or less before departure and have the points redeposited, you’ll pay a fee but if you cancel at most 31 days prior to departure there will be no fees.
  • According to United Airlines cancellation policy for general members, the United miles redeposit fee is $125.
  • For elite members, fees can go as low as $50 for Premier Platinum and are free for Premier 1K members.

Due to Covid:

If you have or were in contact with someone who had coronavirus, you are allowed to cancel your flight and receive a full refund to the original source of payment, according to the United Cancellation policy for covid. This United Airlines covid 19 policy applies to both domestic and international flights. Furthermore, the covid test requirement for United Airlines is based on the place of your travel. You can easily verify your needs by entering your flight details on the official site, and all requirements will be displayed.

Bad weather:

Weather changes are beyond our control, and bad weather might strike at any time. In consequence, United Airlines established a cancellation policy. If you missed a flight due to bad weather or the flight was unable to fly due to such conditions, the airlines will cancel your ticket and return your money to your account.

After check-in:

According to the cancellation policy, you can cancel the United flight after check-in. You can do this by calling the airline or by signing in to your account. Additionally, you can ask a United Airlines executive to make this cancellation for you at the airport.

Military:

If you are an active military member, United provides you with simple policies as a thank-you for your service. United's cancellation policy for military personnel is very flexible. If you are a discharged or current member of the military, you can cancel your ticket at any time and there will be no penalty.

Companion ticket:

United Airlines' companion ticket cancellation policy stipulates that you can only book your companion ticket if the ticket holder is flying with you. The cancellation of a companion pass is dependent on the cancellation of the main holder's flight.

United Airlines No Show Policy

United Airlines' no-show policy states that if you do not arrive at the airport to board your flight and fail to cancel your flight seat reservation, the airline will cancel your trip and charge you a no-show fee of USD 125.

United Airlines Cancellation Fees

According to United's cancelation policy the Airlines has started with no change fees for the majority of the flights but some of the United Airlines flights still hold a cancellation fee. Moreover, United Airline change fees for international and domestic flights are dependent on the distance covered and the type of seat that was chosen for your travel. United flight cancellation fee for various fares is as follows:

Tickets Cancellation charges
Basic economy Not allowed
Refundable ticket $0
Non-refundable ticket For United Airlines cancellation policy international flight fees: upto $400 depending on the class of cabin.
United Airlines domestic flight cancellation policy cost: $200.
Booked With Miles Award tickets vary to general members, premier silver, premier gold, premier platinum, and premier 1k.

United Airlines Refund Policy

United airline understand your need to cancel or modify your flight tickets at last moment hence, for flyers that came up with the best cancellation policy and to provide ticket refund then made united airlines refund policy. To know whether you are entitled to get a united flight refund read the following information:

  • United airlines credit a full refund if the flight is canceled by the airlines.
  • United Airlines flight refund is also made if there is any delay in the schedule of your flight.
  • If you upgrade your seat on united then, a refund of the difference in fare will be made.
  • If you choose a refundable ticket then you can cancel your flight ticket at any time and the air line will provide you with a full refund.

How to get a ticket refund by United Airlines?

ONLINE

If you canceled your United Airlines flight due to any reason and now want a refund, you can follow the following steps as per United airlines refund policy and passanger have to fill the United refund form so that, airline will provide you with the refund amount.

  • Go to the Refund page of United Airline
  • Fill out your personal information and flight details.
  • Provide the refund reason but it should be in 1000 characters.
  • Attach documents for your statement.
  • Provide your email for further contact and click on "Submit"
  • Then You have to fill the refund form and refund will be made in a few days.

How to check the refund status for the United flight?

To check the status of your refund, following are the steps as per United airlines refund policy:

  • Go to the official website and open the refunds page.
  • Click on the Check status tab on the right.
  • Fill in your details:
    1. Last name
    2. Ticket or tracking number
  • Click on the Check status button.
  • Your refund status will appear.

United Airlines Delayed Flight Compensation

According to United air cancellation policy, passengers are entitled to receive compensation if a flight has been delayed, or canceled due to being overboard, or denied boarding. Moreover, the compensation will be determined by various factors, like the length of the delay, where you’re flying to and from, and the cause of the delay. Read through the following United Airlines table to know about Delayed Flight Compensation

Frequently Asked Question's

What is United Airlines cancellation policy?

As per united cancellation policy.

  • United Air cancellation policy only applies to tickets purchased directly from the United Airlines portal or from airport counters.
  • Passengers can cancel their ticket within 24 hours after reservation to avoid a cancellation fee.
  • They will charge you a cancellation fee after 24 hours, but you can avoid this if you purchase a refundable ticket.
  • When it comes to non-refundable tickets, passengers have only 24 hours from the time of purchase to cancel. If they exceed that period, they must pay a cancellation fee.
  • If a passenger uses a United gift certificate to purchase a flight ticket, the refund is issued in an electronic travel voucher, future flight credits, and United travel bank credits.
Can I cancel my United flight for free?

Passengers can make any change to their flight or even cancel the ticket within 24 hours after booking to avoid a cancellation fee, according to United Airlines' free cancellation policy.

Will I get a refund if I cancel my United flight?

Yes, everyone can cancel the United flight and get a refund but.

  • If you cancel a flight ticket within 24 hours of booking, then we are eligible to get the full refund.
  • If you cancel a flight after 24 hours of reservation, there is a certain amount of fees that is deducted from the booking charges.
Can I cancel my United Airline ticket?

Yes, you can cancel your United Airlines flight.

  • If you have purchased a refundable ticket, you can cancel it any time before your flight departure.
  • If you have purchased a non-refundable ticket, you will have to pay USD 200 as cancellation charges for a domestic ticket and up to USD 400 for an international ticket, depending on your route and fare type.
  • Basic Economy tickets cannot be canceled after the 24-hour.
What are the fees for United Airlines cancellation policy award travel?

If you are canceling a United award ticket at least 61 days before departure, you have to pay.

  • USD 75 if you’re a general member.
  • USD 50 if you’re a Silver member.
  • USD 25 if you’re a Gold member.
  • USD 0 if you’re a Platinum or 1K member.

If you are canceling your flight within 60 days of departure, you will be charged a cancellation fee.

  • USD 125 if you’re a general member.
  • USD 100 if you’re a Silver member.
  • USD 75 if you’re a Gold member.
  • USD 50 if you’re a Platinum member.
  • USD 0 if you’re a 1K member.
What is the United Airlines Flight cancellation customer service number?

Passengers can contact United Airlines representative at their customer care service number +1-888-526-4112. They will provide you with a complete guide about the united flight cancellation policy.
